title: (No. 10 of 2020)), 4 and 8 (as amended by section 43 of the Act of 2001) of the
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Oireachtas (Allowances) (Members and
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Oireachtas (Allowances) (Members and 

Holders of Parliamentary and Certain Ministerial Offices) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited oireachtas (allowances) (members holder parliamentary certain ministerial offices) order 2020

title: (No. 10 of 2020)), 4 and 8 (as amended by section 43 of the Act of 2001) of the
heading: 2. There is payable to a member of Dáil Éireann who holds or held a
text_raw:
2. There is payable to a member of Dáil Éireann who holds or held a 
position in Dáil Éireann specified in column (2) of Schedule 1 at any reference 
number, an allowance, in respect of the member’s duties as holder of that 
position, annually at the rate specified in column (3) of that Schedule opposite 
that reference number, in respect of any period, beginning on or after 8 
February 2020, during which the member held that position.
text_norm: 2 payable member dail eireann hold held position dail eireann specified column (2) schedule 1 reference number allowance respect member duty holder position annually rate specified column (3) schedule opposite reference number respect period beginning 8 february 2020 member held position

title: (No. 10 of 2020)), 4 and 8 (as amended by section 43 of the Act of 2001) of the
heading: 3. There is payable to a member of Seanad Éireann who holds or held a
text_raw:
3. There is payable to a member of Seanad Éireann who holds or held a 
position in Seanad Éireann, specified in column (2) of Schedule 2 at any 
reference number, an allowance, in respect of the member’s duties as holder of 
that position, annually at the rate specified in column (3) of that Schedule 
opposite that reference number, in respect of any period, beginning on or after 
29 June 2020, during which the member held that position.
text_norm: 3 payable member seanad eireann hold held position seanad eireann specified column (2) schedule 2 reference number allowance respect member duty holder position annually rate specified column (3) schedule opposite reference number respect period beginning 29 june 2020 member held position

title: (No. 10 of 2020)), 4 and 8 (as amended by section 43 of the Act of 2001) of the
heading: 4. There is payable to a member of the Oireachtas who holds or held a
text_raw:
4. There is payable to a member of the Oireachtas who holds or held a 
position as a member of the Houses of the Oireachtas Commission an 
allowance in respect of the member’s duties as holder of that position, at the 
rate of €9,500 annually, in respect of any period, beginning on or after 29 July 
2020, during which the member held that position.
text_norm: 4 payable member oireachtas hold held position member house oireachtas commission allowance respect member duty holder position rate eur9 500 annually respect period beginning 29 july 2020 member held position

title: (No. 10 of 2020)), 4 and 8 (as amended by section 43 of the Act of 2001) of the
heading: 5. There is payable to –
text_raw:
5. There is payable to – 

(a) 

Jack Chambers, Minister of State at – 

(i) 

the Department of the Taoiseach, 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 11th December, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [613] 3 

(ii) 

the Department of Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, 
Sport and Media, and 

(iii) 

the Department of Defence, 

(b) Hildegarde Naughton, Minister of State at – 

(i) 

the Department of Transport, and 

(ii) 

the Department of 
Communications, 

and 

the Environment, Climate and 

(c) Pippa Hackett, Minster of State at 
Agriculture, Food and the Marine, 

the Department of 

for any period beginning on or after 27 June 2020, as the holders of 
those offices, respectively, who regularly attend meetings of the 
Government, an annual allowance at the rate of €11,470.

title: (No. 10 of 2020)), 4 and 8 (as amended by section 43 of the Act of 2001) of the
heading: 6. There is payable to a member of the Oireachtas who holds or held the
text_raw:
6. There is payable to a member of the Oireachtas who holds or held the 
position of chairperson of an Oireachtas Committee specified in Schedule 3 at 
any reference number, an allowance, in respect of the member’s duties as 
holder of that position, annually at the rate specified in column (3) of that 
Schedule opposite that reference number, in respect of any period, beginning 
on or after 12 May 2020, during which the member held that position.
text_norm: 6 payable member oireachtas hold held position chairperson oireachtas committee specified schedule 3 reference number allowance respect member duty holder position annually rate specified column (3) schedule opposite reference number respect period beginning 12 may 2020 member held position
